titles.title: JUSTICE Act of 2019
Jurists United to Stop Trafficking Imitation Child Exploitation Act of 2019
JUSTICE Act of 2019
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the importation or transportation of child sex dolls, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Jurists United to Stop Trafficking Imitation Child Exploitation Act of 2019 or the JUSTICE Act of 2019
This bill broadens the prohibition on importation or transportation of obscene materials.
Specifically, the bill makes it a crime to import, or knowingly use a common carrier or interactive computer service to transport, a child sex doll.
